title: Can someone tell me how Fiora is balanced?
body: Like honestly, she is so ridiculous, I know she is supposed to be high risk high reward, but where is the risk, she has 2 ways of turret diving while getting 0 damage done to her, not to mention her ridiculous early game, not that this really means much, but I just had a game against one, who beat the shit out of me (Riven) with only 2 rejuvination beads, while being 2 levels below me (me 5 her 3,) with only half hp, like wtf?!
